channel.title: I need some help w/ my 1st server
channel.description: hi, im just making a basic server, using testscape source, i made the ip, i have winrar, but i dunno where to get jdk 6 update 6, and i dont know how to make my self admin, or how to create a acc on my server, and i dunno how to get it online, so please can you guys help me, thanks.

item.title: I need some help w/ my 1st server

item.description:

ty, hope this works. :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 12, 2008, 07:57:27 pm[/size][hr]hm, cant get it online

item.title: I need some help w/ my 1st server
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

1: get jdk 6.10.not 6 update 6 here:


https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=jdk-6u10-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer

2:making urself admin by going to characters>account name>go to where it says character-rights = 0 change the 0 to a 1=mod 2=admin 3=owner and 4=hidden admin
3:creating an acc you just simply pick any username/password and login lol,4:click run or runserver.

Read full topic
